General.Name: MRV Engenharia e Participações S.A
General.Description: MRV Engenharia e Participações S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate developer and homebuilder in Brazil and the United States. It offers housing solution platform for the apartments, urbanized properties, and rental units. The company also focuses on the development of projects for residential leasing; and sale of the projects leased to an investment fund. MRV Engenharia e Participações S.A. was founded in 1979 and is based in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Professor Mário Werneck, 621, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil, 30455-610
